cards.name: Abandon Hope
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Abandon Hope, discard X cards.
Look at target opponent's hand and choose X cards from it. That player discards those cards.
cards.flavor: As Gerrard's form vanished into the maw of trees, Hanna mouthed a silent plea, mourning a crushed dream.

cards.name: Advance Scout
cards.text:
First strike
{W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"The soldier's path is worn smooth by the tread of many feet—all in one direction, none returning."
—Oracle en-Vec

cards.name: Aftershock
cards.text: Destroy target artifact, creature, or land. Aftershock deals 3 damage to you.
cards.flavor:
"Every act of destruction has a repercussion."
—Karn, silver golem

cards.name: Altar of Dementia
cards.text: Sacrifice a creature: Target player puts a number of cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
cards.flavor:
"It is not that you will go mad. It is that you will beg for madness."
—Volrath

cards.name: Aluren
cards.text: Any player may play creature cards with converted mana cost 3 or less without paying their mana cost and as though they had flash.
cards.flavor:
Squee bounced up and down. "I sees a horsey, an' a piggy, an' a—"
"If you don't shut up," hissed Mirri, "you'll see a kidney and a spleeny."

cards.name: Ancient Runes
cards.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Ancient Runes deals damage to that player equal to the number of artifacts he or she controls.
cards.flavor: Ertai volunteered to open the portal. He figured he owed it one.

cards.name: Ancient Tomb
cards.text: {T}: Add {2} to your mana pool. Ancient Tomb deals 2 damage to you.
cards.flavor:
There is no glory to be gained in the kingdom of the dead.
—Vec tomb inscription

cards.name: Angelic Protector
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Angelic Protector becomes the target of a spell or ability, Angelic Protector gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"My family sheltered in her light, the dark was content to wait."
—Crovax

cards.name: Anoint
cards.text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

cards.name: Apes of Rath
cards.text: Whenever Apes of Rath attacks, it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
cards.flavor: Monkeys three, monkeys through.

cards.name: Apocalypse
cards.text: Exile all permanents. You discard your hand.
cards.flavor:
"There is a future in which I can see only mist and a single shadow."
—Oracle en-Vec

cards.name: Armor Sliver
cards.text: All Sliver creatures have "{2}: This creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn."
cards.flavor:
Hanna: "We must learn how they protect each other."
Mirri: "After they've done trying to kill us, all right?"

cards.name: Armored Pegasus
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor:
"I always charge a little extra to take on a pegasus. They fly like eagles, kick like mules, and hide like hermits."
—Tahli en-Dal, bounty hunter

cards.name: Auratog
cards.text: Sacrifice an enchantment: Auratog gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The auratog enjoys eating its wards.

cards.name: Avenging Angel
cards.text:
Flying
When Avenging Angel dies, you may put it on top of its owner's library.

cards.name: Barbed Sliver
cards.text: All Sliver creatures have "{2}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
cards.flavor: Spans of spines leapt from one sliver to the next, forming a deadly hedge around the Weatherlight.

cards.name: Bayou Dragonfly
cards.text: Flying, swampwalk
cards.flavor:
"Like a sugar stick with wings!"
—Squee, goblin cabin hand

cards.name: Bellowing Fiend
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Bellowing Fiend deals damage to a creature, Bellowing Fiend deals 3 damage to that creature's controller and 3 damage to you.

cards.name: Benthic Behemoth
cards.text: Islandwalk
cards.flavor:
"Deep devourer   concealed in darkhome
Shrouded it seeks   all becomes fodder
Once we swam   alone and asea
But no more."
—Rootwater Saga

cards.name: Blood Frenzy
cards.text:
Cast Blood Frenzy only before the combat damage step.
Target attacking or blocking creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn. Destroy that creature at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor:
"When Torahn bellows, none survive—not even the warrior whose horns he rides."
—Talruum adage

cards.name: Blood Pet
cards.text: Sacrifice Blood Pet: Add {B} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: "You are wrong," Volrath said. "I do not hate the living. They often prove quite useful to me." And then he laughed.

cards.name: Boil
cards.text: Destroy all Islands.
cards.flavor:
"The fishers will throw out their nets and draw them back filled with dust."
—Oracle en-Vec

cards.name: Booby Trap
cards.text:
As Booby Trap enters the battlefield, name a card other than a basic land card and choose an opponent.
The chosen player reveals each card he or she draws.
When the chosen player draws the named card, sacrifice Booby Trap. If you do, Booby Trap deals 10 damage to that player.

cards.name: Bottle Gnomes
cards.text: Sacrifice Bottle Gnomes: You gain 3 life.
cards.flavor:
"I am reminded of the fable of the silver egg. Its owner cracks it open to see what jewels it holds, only to discover a simple yellow yolk."
—Karn, silver golem

cards.name: Bounty Hunter
cards.text:
{T}: Put a bounty counter on target nonblack creature.
{T}: Destroy target creature with a bounty counter on it.
cards.flavor: "Once they've marked you," Starke said, "the world is made of glass."

cards.name: Broken Fall
cards.text: Return Broken Fall to its owner's hand: Regenerate target creature.
cards.flavor:
"I think I used up all my good luck and all my bad luck in the same fall."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

cards.name: Caldera Lake
cards.text:
Caldera Lake enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool. Caldera Lake deals 1 damage to you.

cards.name: Canopy Spider
cards.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
cards.flavor:
"We know our place in the cycle of life—and it is not as flies."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

cards.name: Canyon Drake
cards.text:
Flying
{1}, Discard a card at random: Canyon Drake gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "These runes are tough enough without the distraction," Ertai muttered, one eye on the drake.

cards.name: Canyon Wildcat
cards.text: Mountainwalk
cards.flavor: "Relative of yours?" Ertai teased. Mirri simply sneered.

cards.name: Capsize
cards.text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Carrionette
cards.text: {2}{B}{B}: Exile Carrionette and target creature unless that creature's controller pays {2}. Activate this ability only if Carrionette is in your graveyard.

cards.name: Chaotic Goo
cards.text:
Chaotic Goo enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may flip a coin. If you win the flip, put a +1/+1 counter on Chaotic Goo. If you lose the flip, remove a +1/+1 counter from Chaotic Goo.

cards.name: Charging Rhino
cards.text: Charging Rhino can't be blocked by more than one creature.
cards.flavor:
"Is it wrong to go straight for what you want? Sneaking is for cats and goblins."
—Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

cards.name: Chill
cards.text: Red spells cost {2} more to cast.
cards.flavor:
"Temper, temper."
—Ertai, wizard adept

cards.name: Choke
cards.text: Islands don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
cards.flavor:
"One day we shall walk where once was water."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

cards.name: Cinder Marsh
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool. Cinder Marsh doesn't untap during your next untap step.

cards.name: Circle of Protection: Black
cards.text: {1}: The next time a black source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

cards.name: Circle of Protection: Blue
cards.text: {1}: The next time a blue source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

cards.name: Circle of Protection: Green
cards.text: {1}: The next time a green source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

cards.name: Circle of Protection: Red
cards.text: {1}: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

cards.name: Circle of Protection: Shadow
cards.text: {1}: The next time a creature of your choice with shadow would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

cards.name: Circle of Protection: White
cards.text: {1}: The next time a white source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

cards.name: Clergy en-Vec
cards.text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
cards.flavor:
"Faith's shield is hammered out by the blows of unbelievers."
—Oracle en-Vec

cards.name: Clot Sliver
cards.text: All Slivers have "{2}: Regenerate this permanent."
cards.flavor:
"One would think I would be accustomed to unexpected returns."
—Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

cards.name: Cloudchaser Eagle
cards.text:
Flying
When Cloudchaser Eagle enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.
cards.flavor:
When the eagle catches a cloud, it tears it into strips that fall to earth.
—Vec myth of the rains

cards.name: Coercion
cards.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.
cards.flavor:
"There's very little that escapes me, Greven. And you will escape very little if you fail."
—Volrath

cards.name: Coffin Queen
cards.text:
You may choose not to untap Coffin Queen during your untap step.
{2}{B}, {T}: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. When Coffin Queen becomes untapped or you lose control of Coffin Queen, exile that creature.

cards.name: Coiled Tinviper
cards.text: First strike
cards.flavor: The bite of the tinviper feels most like a razor drawn across the tongue.

cards.name: Cold Storage
cards.text:
{3}: Exile target creature you control.
Sacrifice Cold Storage: Return each creature card exiled with Cold Storage to the battlefield under your control.

cards.name: Commander Greven il-Vec
cards.text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
When Commander Greven il-Vec enters the battlefield, sacrifice a creature.
cards.flavor:
"Rage is the only freedom left me."
—Greven il-Vec

cards.name: Corpse Dance
cards.text:
Buyback {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Return the top creature card of your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste until end of turn. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Counterspell
cards.text: Counter target spell.
cards.flavor:
"It was probably a lousy spell in the first place."
—Ertai, wizard adept

cards.name: Crazed Armodon
cards.text: {G}: Crazed Armodon gets +3/+0 and gains trample until end of turn. Destroy Crazed Armodon at the beginning of the next end step. Activate this ability only once each turn.
cards.flavor: These are its last days. Mourning is over. Rage remains.

cards.name: Crown of Flames
cards.text:
Enchant creature
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
{R}: Return Crown of Flames to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: It is the forge of kings.

cards.name: Cursed Scroll
cards.text: {3}, {T}: Name a card. Reveal a card at random from your hand. If it's the named card, Cursed Scroll deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Dark Banishing
cards.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor:
"It is the way of most wizards to begin by exiling themselves and to end by exiling everyone else."
—Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

cards.name: Dark Ritual
cards.text: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"If there is such a thing as too much power, I have not discovered it."
—Volrath

cards.name: Darkling Stalker
cards.text:
{B}: Regenerate Darkling Stalker.
{B}: Darkling Stalker gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"In this dark place, yes, I am afraid of my own shadow."
—Mirri of the Weatherlight

cards.name: Dauthi Embrace
cards.text: {B}{B}: Target creature gains shadow until end of turn. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
cards.flavor:
"The Dauthi army grows by screams and bounds."
—Lyna, Soltari emissary

cards.name: Dauthi Ghoul
cards.text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Whenever a creature with shadow dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Dauthi Ghoul.

cards.name: Dauthi Horror
cards.text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Dauthi Horror can't be blocked by white creatures.

cards.name: Dauthi Marauder
cards.text: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
cards.flavor:
"The Dauthi came from beneath the Ruins one night, and the darkness cast them in the best possible light."
—Soltari Tales of Life

cards.name: Dauthi Mercenary
cards.text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
{1}{B}: Dauthi Mercenary gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"The Dauthi believe they dignify murder by paying for it."
—Lyna, Soltari emissary

cards.name: Dauthi Mindripper
cards.text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Whenever Dauthi Mindripper attacks and isn't blocked, you may sacrifice it. If you do, defending player discards three cards.

cards.name: Dauthi Slayer
cards.text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Dauthi Slayer attacks each turn if able.
cards.flavor:
"They have knives for every soul."
—Lyna, Soltari emissary

cards.name: Deadshot
cards.text: Tap target creature. It deals damage equal to its power to another target creature.
cards.flavor:
"Carrion! Keep your distance. My blade will come to you!"
—Crovax

cards.name: Death Pits of Rath
cards.text: Whenever a creature is dealt damage, destroy it. It can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor: As the sludge below began to shift and take shapes, Gerrard turned from the railing to Orim. "I suppose," he said, "it's a little too late for prayer, isn't it?"

cards.name: Diabolic Edict
cards.text: Target player sacrifices a creature.
cards.flavor: Greven il-Vec lifted Vhati off his feet. "The fall will give you time to think on your failure."

cards.name: Dirtcowl Wurm
cards.text: Whenever an opponent plays a land, put a +1/+1 counter on Dirtcowl Wurm.
cards.flavor: Few of Rath's rivers follow a steady course, so many new channels are carved for them.

cards.name: Disenchant
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
cards.flavor: The swarm seemed unmoved by the artificial slivers' destruction. "They clearly were not the leaders," Hanna cursed. "I guess we'll have to do this the hard way."

cards.name: Dismiss
cards.text:
Counter target spell.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"There is nothing you can do that I cannot simply deny."
—Ertai, wizard adept

cards.name: Disturbed Burial
cards.text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Dracoplasm
cards.text:
Flying
As Dracoplasm enters the battlefield, sacrifice any number of creatures. Dracoplasm's power becomes the total power of those creatures and its toughness becomes their total toughness.
{R}: Dracoplasm gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Dread of Night
cards.text: White creatures get -1/-1.
cards.flavor:
"These moonless, foreign skies keep me in thrall. Dark whispers echo in the night, and I cannot resist."
—Selenia, dark angel

cards.name: Dream Cache
cards.text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand both on top of your library or both on the bottom of your library.
cards.flavor:
"The sanctity of poverty is an invention of the rich."
—Starke

cards.name: Dregs of Sorrow
cards.text: Destroy X target nonblack creatures. Draw X cards.
cards.flavor: Crovax gazed upon the dead, and for one dark moment he saw a banquet.

cards.name: Duplicity
cards.text:
When Duplicity enters the battlefield, exile the top five cards of your library face down.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile all cards from your hand face down. If you do, put all other cards you own exiled with Duplicity into your hand.
At the beginning of your end step, discard a card.
When you lose control of Duplicity, put all cards exiled with Duplicity into their owner's graveyard.

cards.name: Earthcraft
cards.text: Tap an untapped creature you control: Untap target basic land.
cards.flavor:
"The land gives up little, but we are masters of persuasion."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

cards.name: Echo Chamber
cards.text: {4}, {T}: An opponent chooses target creature he or she controls. Put a token that's a copy of that creature onto the battlefield. That token gains haste until end of turn. Exile the token at the beginning of the next end step. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

cards.name: Eladamri's Vineyard
cards.text: At the beginning of each player's precombat main phase, add {G}{G} to that player's mana pool.
cards.flavor: The mushroom wine made Gerrard's head spin, and his stomach soon followed suit.

cards.name: Eladamri, Lord of Leaves
cards.text:
Other Elf creatures have forestwalk.
Other Elves have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)
cards.flavor:
"We have been patient. We have planned our attack. We are ready . . . now."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

cards.name: Elite Javelineer
cards.text: Whenever Elite Javelineer blocks, it deals 1 damage to target attacking creature.
cards.flavor:
"Precision is frequently more valuable than force."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

cards.name: Elven Warhounds
cards.text: Whenever Elven Warhounds becomes blocked by a creature, put that creature on top of its owner's library.
cards.flavor:
"If a creature is dumb enough to love you for leashing it, why would you want to follow its lead?"
—Mirri of the Weatherlight

cards.name: Elvish Fury
cards.text:
Buyback {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.name: Emerald Medallion
cards.text: Green spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

cards.name: Emmessi Tome
cards.text: {5}, {T}: Draw two cards, then discard a card.
cards.flavor: It is like life and destiny: we think we know the story, but we have read only half the tale.

cards.name: Endless Scream
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Endless Scream enters the battlefield with X scream counters on it.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 for each scream counter on Endless Scream.
cards.flavor:
"I have made Crovax weep; now I will make him scream. The pain will not end, but will bind him to me."
—Volrath

cards.name: Energizer
cards.text: {2}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Energizer.
cards.flavor: Like a kettle set to boil, it must eventually go off—on someone.

cards.name: Enfeeblement
cards.text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.
cards.flavor: Crovax had witnessed Selenia lead the Predator to the Weatherlight. As the battle raged on deck, he felt his strength melt in the heat of her betrayal.

cards.name: Enraging Licid
cards.text:
{R}, {T}: Enraging Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {R} to end this effect.
Enchanted creature has haste.

cards.name: Ertai's Meddling
cards.text:
X can't be 0.
Target spell's controller exiles it with X delay counters on it.
At the beginning of each of that player's upkeeps, if that card is exiled, remove a delay counter from it. If the card has no delay counters on it, he or she puts it onto the stack as a copy of the original spell.

cards.name: Escaped Shapeshifter
cards.text: As long as an opponent controls a creature with flying not named Escaped Shapeshifter, Escaped Shapeshifter has flying. The same is true for first strike, trample, and protection from any color.

cards.name: Essence Bottle
cards.text:
{3}, {T}: Put an elixir counter on Essence Bottle.
{T}, Remove all elixir counters from Essence Bottle: You gain 2 life for each elixir counter removed this way.

cards.name: Evincar's Justice
cards.text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Evincar's Justice deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

cards.name: Excavator
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice a basic land: Target creature gains landwalk of each of the land types of the sacrificed land until end of turn.

cards.name: Extinction
cards.text: Destroy all creatures of the creature type of your choice.
cards.flavor:
"I once had an entire race killed just to listen to the rattling of their dried bones as I waded through them."
—Volrath

cards.name: Fevered Convulsions
cards.text: {2}{B}{B}: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
cards.flavor:
"Tell me again why you failed to capture Gerrard, you worthless pile of spine."
—Volrath, to Greven

cards.name: Field of Souls
cards.text: Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Fighting Drake
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor: Two things are needed to survive the harsh skies of Rath: a thick hide and a thicker skull.

cards.name: Firefly
cards.text:
Flying
{R}: Firefly gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"If they don't pinch, they burn. Can't ya eat any of da bugs here?"
—Squee, goblin cabin hand

cards.name: Fireslinger
cards.text: {T}: Fireslinger deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to you.
cards.flavor:
"Remember the moral of the fireslinger fable: with power comes isolation."
—Karn, silver golem

cards.name: Flailing Drake
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Flailing Drake blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Too many choices will always distract a greedy beast.

cards.name: Flickering Ward
cards.text:
Enchant creature
As Flickering Ward enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Enchanted creature has protection from the chosen color. This effect doesn't remove Flickering Ward.
{W}: Return Flickering Ward to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Flowstone Giant
cards.text: {R}: Flowstone Giant gets +2/-2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
When the first of these giants woke from the bedrock, he was still sleepy. He yawned and stretched until his legs grew so thin that they snapped like icicles in the sun.
—Vec lore

cards.name: Flowstone Salamander
cards.text: {R}: Flowstone Salamander deals 1 damage to target creature blocking it.
cards.flavor: The Furnace of Rath is periodically illuminated by their sparkling yawns.

cards.name: Flowstone Sculpture
cards.text: {2}, Discard a card: Put a +1/+1 counter on Flowstone Sculpture or Flowstone Sculpture gains flying, first strike, or trample. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
cards.flavor: The sculptor, weary of his work, created art that would finish itself.

cards.name: Flowstone Wyvern
cards.text:
Flying
{R}: Flowstone Wyvern gets +2/-2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Where I come from, stone stays on the ground."
—Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

cards.name: Fool's Tome
cards.text: {2}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you have no cards in hand.
cards.flavor:
Squee: "What's that?"
Ertai: "It's a magical book."
Squee: "Am I smart enough ta use it?"
Ertai: "You could say that."

cards.name: Frog Tongue
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Frog Tongue enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has reach. (It can block creatures with flying.)
cards.flavor: "But why can't I get one?" sniveled Squee. "All da bugs here got wings."

cards.name: Fugitive Druid
cards.text: Whenever Fugitive Druid becomes the target of an Aura spell, you draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"If the druids are so devoted to their trees, I will carve them coffins from their precious heartwood."
—Volrath

cards.name: Furnace of Rath
cards.text: If a source would deal damage to a creature or player, it deals double that damage to that creature or player instead.

cards.name: Fylamarid
cards.text:
Flying
Fylamarid can't be blocked by blue creatures.
{U}: Target creature becomes blue until end of turn.

cards.name: Gallantry
cards.text:
Target blocking creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: "Forgive me," Mirri whispered. "I thought you a burden, and you saved my life." Hanna quietly accepted the apology.

cards.name: Gaseous Form
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.
cards.flavor:
"It's hard to hurt anyone when you're as transparent as your motives."
—Ertai, wizard adept

cards.name: Gerrard's Battle Cry
cards.text: {2}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Gerrard grinned and drew his sword. "This won't be a fair fight," he called to his crew. "They should have brought a second ship!"

cards.name: Ghost Town
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{0}: Return Ghost Town to its owner's hand. Activate this ability only if it's not your turn.
cards.flavor:
"The air here smells like a grave."
—Crovax

cards.name: Giant Crab
cards.text: {U}: Giant Crab gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
cards.flavor: During the giant crabs' mating season, Skyshroud nights are filled with the clatter of their skirmishes.

cards.name: Giant Strength
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
cards.flavor: "Crovax seems filled only with shadows," thought Orim. "Where does his strength come from?"

cards.name: Goblin Bombardment
cards.text: Sacrifice a creature: Goblin Bombardment deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: One mogg to aim the catapult, one mogg to steer the rock.

cards.name: Gravedigger
cards.text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: A full coffin is like a full coffer—both are attractive to thieves.

cards.name: Grindstone
cards.text: {3}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. If both cards share a color, repeat this process.
cards.flavor:
"Memory is a burden that wears at the soul as weather wears at stone."
—Crovax

cards.name: Hand to Hand
cards.text: During combat, players can't cast instant spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.
cards.flavor: The match between Tahngarth and Greven was close only in the mind of the minotaur.

cards.name: Hanna's Custody
cards.text: All artifacts have shroud. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.)
cards.flavor:
"I protect the Legacy with my life if necessary, for its purpose is far more important than my own."
—Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

cards.name: Harrow
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Harrow, sacrifice a land.
Search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: Changing Rath's landscape is like tearing the scab from a wound.

cards.name: Havoc
cards.text: Whenever an opponent casts a white spell, he or she loses 2 life.
cards.flavor: As Orim put the lightning rod into place on the bow, she cast a spell of protection to shield herself from the heat. That's when the Furnace got personal.

cards.name: Heart Sliver
cards.text: All Sliver creatures have haste.
cards.flavor: Gerrard looked all around for the source of the mysterious pulse, and at that moment the slivers boiled forth from the crevasses.

cards.name: Heartwood Dryad
cards.text: Heartwood Dryad can block creatures with shadow as though Heartwood Dryad had shadow.
cards.flavor: To snare what lies between worlds takes the patient reach of trees.

cards.name: Heartwood Giant
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Heartwood Giant deals 2 damage to target player.
cards.flavor: Wind in the trees is soothing, but the same can't be said for trees on the wind.

cards.name: Heartwood Treefolk
cards.text: Forestwalk
cards.flavor:
"In all my years in Llanowar I never understood where trees fit in. They are revered by elves and watered on by dogs."
—Mirri of the Weatherlight

cards.name: Helm of Possession
cards.text:
You may choose not to untap Helm of Possession during your untap step.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Gain control of target creature for as long as you control Helm of Possession and Helm of Possession remains tapped.

cards.name: Hero's Resolve
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+5.
cards.flavor:
"Destiny, chance, fate, fortune—they're all just ways of claiming your successes without claiming your failures."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

cards.name: Horned Sliver
cards.text: All Sliver creatures have trample.
cards.flavor: A bristling wave of slivers broke against the Weatherlight's timbers.

cards.name: Horned Turtle
cards.flavor:
"So like men are they: a hardened shell with fragile flesh beneath."
—Selenia, dark angel

cards.name: Humility
cards.text: All creatures lose all abilities and have base power and toughness 1/1.
cards.flavor:
"One cannot cleanse the wounds of failure."
—Karn, silver golem

cards.name: Imps' Taunt
cards.text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Target creature attacks this turn if able.

cards.name: Insight
cards.text: Whenever an opponent casts a green spell, you draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"We can fight with you or against you. After my day, I'd prefer the former."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

cards.name: Interdict
cards.text:
Counter target activated ability from an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land. That permanent's activated abilities can't be activated this turn. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
Draw a card.

cards.name: Intuition
cards.text: Search your library for three cards and reveal them. Target opponent chooses one. Put that card into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Invulnerability
cards.text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

cards.name: Jackal Pup
cards.text: Whenever Jackal Pup is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to you.
cards.flavor: The first morning after acquiring her familiar, the wizard awoke with fleabites and mange.

cards.name: Jet Medallion
cards.text: Black spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

cards.name: Jinxed Idol
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, Jinxed Idol deals 2 damage to you.
Sacrifice a creature: Target opponent gains control of Jinxed Idol.
cards.flavor: "Here."

cards.name: Kezzerdrix
cards.text:
First strike
At the beginning of your upkeep, if your opponents control no creatures, Kezzerdrix deals 4 damage to you.

cards.name: Kindle
cards.text: Kindle deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Kindle in all graveyards.
cards.flavor: Hope of deliverance is scorched by the fire of futility.

cards.name: Knight of Dawn
cards.text:
First strike
{W}{W}: Knight of Dawn gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
Flash like daybreak to the fray.
—Motto of the Knights of Dawn

cards.name: Knight of Dusk
cards.text: {B}{B}: Destroy target creature blocking Knight of Dusk.
cards.flavor:
Fall like night upon the foe.
—Motto of the Knights of Dusk

cards.name: Krakilin
cards.text:
Krakilin enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}{G}: Regenerate Krakilin.
cards.flavor:
"A perfect reflection of its world: brutal, fetal, and lacking truth."
—Oracle en-Vec

cards.name: Leeching Licid
cards.text:
{B}, {T}: Leeching Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {B} to end this effect.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, Leeching Licid deals 1 damage to that player.

cards.name: Legacy's Allure
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a treasure counter on Legacy's Allure.
Sacrifice Legacy's Allure: Gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to the number of treasure counters on Legacy's Allure. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

cards.name: Legerdemain
cards.text: Exchange control of target artifact or creature and another target permanent that shares one of those types with it. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
cards.flavor: Squee tucked the warm ball in his pocket and slipped a pebble in its place. ‘Glok,' he mumbled, and hid.

cards.name: Light of Day
cards.text: Black creatures can't attack or block.
cards.flavor:
"I do not miss sunlight. The very memory of it burns my eyes."
—Volrath

cards.name: Lightning Blast
cards.text: Lightning Blast deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor:
"Those who fear the darkness have never seen what the light can do."
—Selenia, dark angel

cards.name: Lightning Elemental
cards.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
cards.flavor: A lightning elemental once killed an entire tribe of merfolk—simply by going for a swim.

cards.name: Living Death
cards.text: Each player exiles all creature cards from his or her graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures he or she controls, then puts all cards he or she exiled this way onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Lobotomy
cards.text: Target player reveals his or her hand, then you choose a card other than a basic land card from it. Search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as the chosen card and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

cards.name: Lotus Petal
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Lotus Petal: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: "Hard to imagine," mused Hanna, stroking the petal, "such a lovely flower inspiring such greed."

cards.name: Lowland Giant
cards.flavor: "Faugh!" snorted Tahngarth. "Why would it make a meal of something like you?" Squee looked relieved. "No," he continued, "you'd make a much better toothpick."

cards.name: Maddening Imp
cards.text:
Flying
{T}: Non-Wall creatures the active player controls attack this turn if able. At the beginning of the next end step, destroy each of those creatures that didn't attack this turn. Activate this ability only during an opponent's turn and only before combat.

cards.name: Magmasaur
cards.text:
Magmasaur enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may remove a +1/+1 counter from Magmasaur. If you don't, sacrifice Magmasaur and it deals damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to each creature without flying and each player.

cards.name: Magnetic Web
cards.text:
If a creature with a magnet counter on it attacks, all creatures with magnet counters on them attack if able.
Whenever a creature with a magnet counter on it attacks, all creatures with magnet counters on them block that creature this turn if able.
{1}, {T}: Put a magnet counter on target creature.

cards.name: Mana Severance
cards.text: Search your library for any number of land cards and exile them. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor:
"And when this land is wasted, where will we go?"
—Thalakos lament

cards.name: Manakin
cards.text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Hanna regarded Squee sternly. "Because it's not a toy, no matter how much it may look like one," she said, taking the manakin from him.

cards.name: Manta Riders
cards.text: {U}: Manta Riders gains flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Water is firmament to the finned."
—Oracle en-Vec

cards.name: Marble Titan
cards.text: Creatures with power 3 or greater don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
cards.flavor:
"Strapping on nine hundred pounds of armor every morning would make any warrior cross."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

cards.name: Marsh Lurker
cards.text: Sacrifice a Swamp: Marsh Lurker gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
cards.flavor: From the mists it rises, into the mists it retreats; through the mists it walks, fearless and unseen.

cards.name: Master Decoy
cards.text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
cards.flavor:
"A skilled decoy can throw your enemies off your trail. A master decoy can survive to do it again."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

cards.name: Mawcor
cards.text:
Flying
{T}: Mawcor deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: From its maw comes neither word nor whisper—only wind.

cards.name: Maze of Shadows
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Untap target attacking creature with shadow. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.

cards.name: Meditate
cards.text: Draw four cards. You skip your next turn.
cards.flavor:
"Part of me believes that Barrin taught me meditation simply to shut me up."
—Ertai, wizard adept

cards.name: Metallic Sliver
cards.flavor: When the clever counterfeit was accepted by the hive, Volrath's influence upon the slivers grew even stronger.

cards.name: Mindwhip Sliver
cards.text: All Slivers have "{2}, Sacrifice this permanent: Target player discards a card at random. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery."
cards.flavor:
"They share more than their thoughts. We must shatter their link quickly!"
—Hanna, to Orim

cards.name: Minion of the Wastes
cards.text:
Trample
As Minion of the Wastes enters the battlefield, pay any amount of life.
Minion of the Wastes's power and toughness are each equal to the life paid as it entered the battlefield.

cards.name: Mirri's Guile
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
cards.flavor: Hanna was astounded. Mirri read every leaf and wisp of breeze like a book of ancient lore.

cards.name: Mnemonic Sliver
cards.text: All Slivers have "{2}, Sacrifice this permanent: Draw a card."
cards.flavor:
"A jigsaw puzzle that lives, breeds, and thinks."
—Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

cards.name: Mogg Cannon
cards.text: {T}: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains flying until end of turn. Destroy that creature at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor: Moggs never volunteer for anything twice.

cards.name: Mogg Conscripts
cards.text: Mogg Conscripts can't attack unless you've cast a creature spell this turn.
cards.flavor:
"Torahn's horns! They've seen us. Now, statue, you must fight to save yourself!"
—Tahngarth, aboard the Predator

cards.name: Mogg Fanatic
cards.text: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: Mogg Fanatic deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: "I got it! I got it! I—"

cards.name: Mogg Hollows
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool. Mogg Hollows doesn't untap during your next untap step.

cards.name: Mogg Raider
cards.text: Sacrifice a Goblin: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: The evisceration of one mogg always cheers up the rest.

cards.name: Mogg Squad
cards.text: Mogg Squad gets -1/-1 for each other creature on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: As they crept into the Weatherlight's hold, the squad leader held up his hand and whispered, "Stop, goblins—what's that sound?"

cards.name: Mongrel Pack
cards.text: When Mongrel Pack dies during combat, put four 1/1 green Hound creature tokens onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Mounted Archers
cards.text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
{W}: Mounted Archers can block an additional creature this turn.

cards.name: Muscle Sliver
cards.text: All Sliver creatures get +1/+1.
cards.flavor: The air was filled with the cracks and snaps of flesh hardening as the new sliver joined the battle.

cards.name: Natural Spring
cards.text: Target player gains 8 life.
cards.flavor: Mirri listened intently, even as Hanna held the healing water to her lips. Would the sound of the spring drown out the elves' approach?

cards.name: Nature's Revolt
cards.text: All lands are 2/2 creatures that are still lands.
cards.flavor:
"One day the land will don the semblance of flesh and challenge even the plowshare's blade."
—Oracle en-Vec

cards.name: Needle Storm
cards.text: Needle Storm deals 4 damage to each creature with flying.
cards.flavor: The rain is driven like nails.

cards.name: No Quarter
cards.text:
Whenever a creature becomes blocked by a creature with lesser power, destroy the blocking creature.
Whenever a creature blocks a creature with lesser power, destroy the attacking creature.
cards.flavor: As Gerrard and Greven neared each other, the moggs caught between them realized they should flee.

cards.name: Nurturing Licid
cards.text:
{G}, {T}: Nurturing Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {G} to end this effect.
{G}: Regenerate enchanted creature.

cards.name: Opportunist
cards.text: {T}: Opportunist deals 1 damage to target creature that was dealt damage this turn.
cards.flavor: The third time the Oracle glanced suspiciously at him, Starke decided she had glanced twice too often.

cards.name: Oracle en-Vec
cards.text: {T}: Target opponent chooses any number of creatures he or she controls. During that player's next turn, the chosen creatures attack if able, and other creatures can't attack. At the beginning of that turn's end step, destroy each of the chosen creatures that didn't attack. Activate this ability only during your turn.

cards.name: Orim's Prayer
cards.text: Whenever one or more creatures attack you, you gain 1 life for each attacking creature.
cards.flavor:
"As usual, there will be time for prayer only after the worst happens."
—Orim, Samite healer

cards.name: Orim, Samite Healer
cards.text: {T}: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
cards.flavor:
"The silkworm spins itself a new existence. So the healer weaves the threads of life."
—Orim, Samite healer

cards.name: Overrun
cards.text: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"You want to know your enemy? Look at your feet while you trample him."
—Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

cards.name: Pacifism
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
cards.flavor: Frozen by conscience, Karn did not resist as the moggs carried him to the Predator.

cards.name: Pallimud
cards.text:
As Pallimud enters the battlefield, choose an opponent.
Pallimud's power is equal to the number of tapped lands the chosen player controls.
cards.flavor: The old Vec tell tales of a beast that fed on scraps but turned its nose up at the lavish banquet they set in its honor.

cards.name: Patchwork Gnomes
cards.text: Discard a card: Regenerate Patchwork Gnomes.
cards.flavor:
"Just when I get them working, they always start fighting and tearing at each other for spare parts."
—Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

cards.name: Pearl Medallion
cards.text: White spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

cards.name: Pegasus Refuge
cards.text: {2}, Discard a card: Put a 1/1 white Pegasus creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
The first Rath-born pegasus was so offended by the sky that it hid its eyes in the earth.
—Vec lore

cards.name: Perish
cards.text: Destroy all green creatures. They can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor:
"There will come a time when the voices of soil and seedling will sing only laments."
—Oracle en-Vec

cards.name: Phyrexian Grimoire
cards.text: {4}, {T}: Target opponent chooses one of the top two cards of your graveyard. Exile that card and put the other one into your hand.
cards.flavor: Every page cost a life; every secret cost a thousand more.

cards.name: Phyrexian Hulk
cards.flavor:
"They are convenient in having no souls, but less so in having no spirit."
—Volrath

cards.name: Phyrexian Splicer
cards.text: {2}, {T}, Choose flying, first strike, trample, or shadow: Until end of turn, target creature with the chosen ability loses it and another target creature gains it.

cards.name: Pincher Beetles
cards.text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
cards.flavor:
"No fair! Since when does a bug get ta munch on me?"
—Squee, goblin cabin hand

cards.name: Pine Barrens
cards.text:
Pine Barrens enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool. Pine Barrens deals 1 damage to you.

cards.name: Pit Imp
cards.text:
Flying
{B}: Pit Imp gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than twice each turn.
cards.flavor: The moans of the Death Pits were underscored by the chattering of imps, for whom the ship was cause for much discussion.

cards.name: Power Sink
cards.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If he or she doesn't, that player taps all lands with mana abilities he or she controls and empties his or her mana pool.

cards.name: Precognition
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of target opponent's library. If you do, you may put that card on the bottom of that player's library.
cards.flavor: A gleam like struggling sunlight penetrated Selenia's dark thoughts.

cards.name: Propaganda
cards.text: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature he or she controls that's attacking you.
cards.flavor:
"You've failed Gerrard. You've failed the Legacy. You've failed yourself. I can do no more."
—Volrath, to Karn

cards.name: Puppet Strings
cards.text: {2}, {T}: You may tap or untap target creature.
cards.flavor: "Have no illusions," Volrath warned Greven, "about free will."

cards.name: Quickening Licid
cards.text:
{1}{W}, {T}: Quickening Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {W} to end this effect.
Enchanted creature has first strike.

cards.name: Rain of Tears
cards.text: Destroy target land.
cards.flavor:
"These rains cannot quench; they carve the land's face like a scalpel on flesh."
—Crovax

cards.name: Rampant Growth
cards.text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: Rath forces plants from its surface as one presses whey from cheese.

cards.name: Ranger en-Vec
cards.text:
First strike
{G}: Regenerate Ranger en-Vec.
cards.flavor:
"The path of least resistance will seldom lead you beyond your doorstep."
—Oracle en-Vec

cards.name: Rathi Dragon
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Rathi Dragon enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice two Mountains.
cards.flavor:
Wrap the flame as twine
Kingdoms will be thine.

cards.name: Rats of Rath
cards.text: {B}: Destroy target artifact, creature, or land you control.
cards.flavor:
"These creatures offer new challenges in the scrutiny of entrails."
—Oracle en-Vec

cards.name: Reality Anchor
cards.text:
Target creature loses shadow until end of turn.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"See how you like it."
—Ertai, wizard adept

cards.name: Reanimate
cards.text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.
cards.flavor:
"You will learn to earn death."
—Volrath

cards.name: Reap
cards.text: Return up to X target cards from your graveyard to your hand, where X is the number of black permanents target opponent controls as you cast Reap.
cards.flavor:
"Let Volrath choke on his crop of hatred."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

cards.name: Reckless Spite
cards.text: Destroy two target nonblack creatures. You lose 5 life.
cards.flavor:
"My plan's elegance leads my enemies to believe it is spite that fuels me."
—Volrath

cards.name: Recycle
cards.text:
Skip your draw step.
Whenever you play a card, draw a card.
Your maximum hand size is two.

cards.name: Reflecting Pool
cards.text: {T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any type that a land you control could produce.
cards.flavor:
"The reflection of land interests me far more than its reality."
—Volrath

cards.name: Renegade Warlord
cards.text:
First strike
Whenever Renegade Warlord attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"His tongue must be honey, the way he gathers ants to fight with him."
—Volrath

cards.name: Repentance
cards.text: Target creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.
cards.flavor:
"The cannon wasn't aimed at you!" pleaded Vhati.
"I'm not sure which is more pathetic," replied Greven, "your judgment or your aim."

cards.name: Respite
cards.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. You gain 1 life for each attacking creature.
cards.flavor: "If they board us we're finished," warned Orim. Crovax nodded. "And if they don't . . . what then?"

cards.name: Rolling Thunder
cards.text: Rolling Thunder deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.
cards.flavor: "Such rage," thought Vhati, gazing up at the thunderhead from the Predator. "It is Greven's mind manifest."

cards.name: Root Maze
cards.text: Artifacts and lands enter the battlefield tapped.
cards.flavor:
"We should step up repairs. I think the forest has plans for us."
—Crovax

cards.name: Rootbreaker Wurm
cards.text: Trample (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)
cards.flavor: As Gerrard made his escape, the wurm covered his flight by helping itself to three great mouthfuls of merfolk.

cards.name: Rootwalla
cards.text: {1}{G}: Rootwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
cards.flavor: If you try to sneak up on a rootwalla, you'll suddenly find yourself dealing with twice the lizard.

cards.name: Rootwater Depths
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool. Rootwater Depths doesn't untap during your next untap step.

cards.name: Rootwater Diver
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Rootwater Diver: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor:
"Drop a dagger into the murky deep and the merfolk will cut your throat with it."
—Skyshroud saying

cards.name: Rootwater Hunter
cards.text: {T}: Rootwater Hunter deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor:
"Bitter water   vicious wave
Shadow-cold shallows   root-made maze
Home's angry embrace."
—Rootwater Saga

cards.name: Rootwater Matriarch
cards.text: {T}: Gain control of target creature for as long as that creature is enchanted.

cards.name: Rootwater Shaman
cards.text: You may cast Aura cards with enchant creature as though they had flash.
cards.flavor:
"Ugh! When did orcs and fish start having kids?"
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

cards.name: Ruby Medallion
cards.text: Red spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

cards.name: Sacred Guide
cards.text: {1}{W}, Sacrifice Sacred Guide: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a white card. Put that card into your hand and exile all other cards revealed this way.

cards.name: Sadistic Glee
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever a creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.
cards.flavor:
"First blood isn't as important as last blood."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

cards.name: Safeguard
cards.text: {2}{W}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target creature this turn.
cards.flavor:
"I'm amused by wasted effort when it's not my own."
—Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

cards.name: Salt Flats
cards.text:
Salt Flats enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool. Salt Flats deals 1 damage to you.

cards.name: Sandstone Warrior
cards.text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
{R}: Sandstone Warrior gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"I used to describe something stable as ‘rock solid.' So much for that expression."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

cards.name: Sapphire Medallion
cards.text: Blue spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

cards.name: Sarcomancy
cards.text:
When Sarcomancy enters the battlefield, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are no Zombies on the battlefield, Sarcomancy deals 1 damage to you.

cards.name: Scabland
cards.text:
Scabland enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool. Scabland deals 1 damage to you.

cards.name: Scalding Tongs
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have three or fewer cards in hand, Scalding Tongs deals 1 damage to target opponent.
cards.flavor:
"This has nothing to do with what you know and everything to do with what I wish."
—Volrath

cards.name: Scorched Earth
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Scorched Earth, discard X land cards.
Destroy X target lands.
cards.flavor:
"Fire cleanses as well as destroys; that is the nature of change."
—Oracle en-Vec

cards.name: Scragnoth
cards.text:
Scragnoth can't be countered.
Protection from blue
